title: Joining late queue
body: I keep joining late in queue and i cant even pick my role before others anymore i always stuck supp now any fix for this?

replies.body:
This honestly seems like some sort of weird connection issue.  After getting through the queue, you need to connect to a service called Maestro.  This service is what helps run Champion Selection and connects you to all of the other players in the game.  If you have an unstable connection and it delays your connection to it, it may explain why you enter so late compared to anyone else.

To get this fixed up, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It should get you connected immediately, and eliminate your tardiness to the lobby.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing issues!
